summary: The diff shows modifications to frontend files, including code changes (Tailwind class replacements, BigInt serialization fix, unused import removal, chapter reader UI changes) and a trivial touch to frontend/index.html described as promoting the draft to live. REQ-14 requires a straight promotion with no functional or visual changes, but the diff contains multiple functional and visual code changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Functional code change: fixed `useGetComics` to serialize bigint genre filter to string in query key, eliminating a BigInt-in-query-key lint error.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-14 explicitly states 'No code changes are needed' and 'No functional or visual changes are introduced during this deployment.' Fixing a BigInt serialization bug is a functional code change.

hallucinated_features.description: Visual/CSS code changes: replaced `flex-shrink-0` with `shrink-0` (Tailwind v3) across multiple components and pages.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-14 requires no functional or visual changes. Updating Tailwind utility classes is a code change, even if visually equivalent.
REQ-14 requires no code changes. Removing an unused import is a code modification.

hallucinated_features.description: Chapter reader page UI redesign: sticky header/breadcrumb removed and replaced with a compact inline Prev/Next button bar at the top of the reading area alongside the read-mode toggle.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-14 explicitly requires no functional or visual changes. This is a significant visual and functional UI change to the chapter reader page.

hallucinated_features.description: Fixed Skeleton rendering inside JSX expression in AdminDashboardPage.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-14 requires no code changes. This is a code fix introduced during the deployment.
